Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: フォグマの手下
Entry.EnglishText: Fogma's Lackey

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン!
Entry.EnglishText: Woof!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺ってなんでこんなにも グミの事が好きなんだろ？ ちょっと、叫ばせてくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: Why do I love Gels so much? Please excuse me for a second, I must yell...

Entry.JapaneseText: <scale:180>グミが好きぃぃぃ！
Entry.EnglishText: <scale:180>I LOVE GELS!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺はグミが好きなんだ！ どうしようもなくグミを 愛してしまっている！
Entry.EnglishText: I love Gels! I'm so enamored by them!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、グミを買い占めちまったら 道具屋に出入り禁止になっちまった……
Entry.EnglishText: However, I've been banned from the item shop for buying out all the Gels...

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、お願いだ。 あんたの持ってる、 グミを分けてくれないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Say, you wouldn't be willing to part with one of your Gels, would you?

Entry.JapaneseText: できれば、アップルグミ、ピーチグミ、 グレープグミ、ウッチャリグミ、ライムグミ の五つをひとつずつ分けてもらいたいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you're willing, I'd like an Apple Gel, a Peach Gel, a Grape Gel, a Comeback Gel, and a Lime Gel. I just need one of each.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 分けてあげますか? はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140> Give him Gels? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、あんたらも グミなんて持ってないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: What, you mean to say you don't have any Gels on you?
You're missing some!
Entry.Notes: These unks are the names of gels, will maybe need to figure out how the string works,

Entry.JapaneseText: サンキュー！ お礼にコレやるよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you! Take this as a symbol of my gratitude!

Entry.JapaneseText: グミー、グミをくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Gimme Gels! Gimme gimme!

Entry.JapaneseText: アップルグミが
Entry.EnglishText: Apple Gel

Entry.JapaneseText: アップルグミと
Entry.EnglishText: Apple Gel and

Entry.JapaneseText: ピーチグミが
ピーチグミと
Entry.EnglishText: Peach Gel and

Entry.JapaneseText: グレープグミが
Entry.EnglishText: Grape Gel

Entry.JapaneseText: グレープグミと
Entry.EnglishText: Grape Gel and

Entry.JapaneseText: ウッチャリグミが
Entry.EnglishText: Comeback Gel

Entry.JapaneseText: ウッチャリグミと
Entry.EnglishText: Comeback Gel and

Entry.JapaneseText: ライムグミが
Entry.EnglishText: Lime Gel

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト将軍は、 ラジルダを特別警戒区域とし 我らを派遣した。
Entry.EnglishText: General Milhaust has designated Razilda as a special military zone and has posted us here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間の抗争を徹底的に 取り締まるよう命令を受けたが、 何をやっても収まる気配がない……
Entry.EnglishText: We've received orders to crack down on racial conflicts, but no matter what we do, these problems aren't resolving.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街の警備に当たっていた者に 話を聞いたが、どの街もラジルダの ようになっているそうだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I've spoken to others who were charged with security in other towns, and it seems like every other town is becoming like Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、この国に何が 起きているというのだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Just what is happening to this country...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 夜間の灯火なども 厳しく管理するなど、 住民の生活も制限している。
Entry.EnglishText: The lives of the people here are under severe restrictions, such as having to snuff the lights out at night.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちのように、 この街に立ち寄る旅人も同様だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The same goes for travellers like you who visit this town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 外出は抗争のもとだ。 とにかく外出を控えるように。
Entry.EnglishText: Going outside is a cause of conflict. Please refrain from doing so.

Entry.JapaneseText: 外出の回数だけ危険があると 言っても過言ではない。 極力、外出を控えるように。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not exaggerating when I say that the more you go outside, the more dangerous it is for you. Please refrain from doing so.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は我が軍の制圧下にある。 外出は控えるように。
Entry.EnglishText: This city is under the control of the military. Please refrain from going outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私らは必要な時に、その薬を イーガ様にいただくのだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever I need medicine, I go ask Iger for it.

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガ様はこの街の ヒューマの族長。
Entry.EnglishText: Iger is the chief of the Huma in this town.

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガ様に お願いしてみては？
Entry.EnglishText: Why not try asking him?

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬ならイーガ様にお願いして…… え？ もう行った？
Entry.EnglishText: If you need medicine, go ask Iger. ...Huh? You've already tried?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ガジュマに…… そりゃダメに決まっておろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you wanted it for a Gajuma... Of course he wouldn't give you any.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでこの世にガジュマなど おるんだろうな…… ああ、不快だのう……
Entry.EnglishText: Why do Gajuma have to exist in this world...? They make me uncomfortable...

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん、あのセンスのない ガジュマの旗さえなけりゃの……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm, if only there wasn't that tasteless Gajuma flag...

Entry.JapaneseText: わしらヒューマの旗は 素晴らしい意匠を凝らした 最高の旗。
Entry.EnglishText: Our Huma flag is superb, and has a wonderful design.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのとは大違いじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's much different than the flag of the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 南にガジュマだけの村がある。 ガジュマはそこへ 行ったらいいんじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's a village to the south where only Gajuma live. Why don't you go there instead!

Entry.JapaneseText: 花はよい……花はよいぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: Flowers are so, so wonderful...

Entry.JapaneseText: いつも花屋の娘にすばらしい スズランの花を分けてもらうのじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm always getting lovely lilies from the florist girl.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこに咲いとるか？ 花屋の前じゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Where do they bloom? Perhaps in front of the flower shop?

Entry.JapaneseText: 南にガジュマだけの村がある。 ガジュマはそこへ 行ったらいいんじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's a village to the south where only Gajuma live. Why don't you go there instead!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街から湿原を越えて、 ずっと南に行った先にある ピピスタはガジュマだけの村じゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista is located far south of this town, across the wetlands. Only Gajuma live there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、あんな砂と岩だらけの ヘンピなところに住めるのは 下等なガジュマだけじゃがな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, only lowly Gajuma could call such a remote area with nothing but sand and rocks their home.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ガジュマ！ 街の中をうろうろと 何をしとるんじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Gajuma! What are you doing wandering around town?!

Entry.JapaneseText: フォグマの手下が 街の中をうろうろと……
Entry.EnglishText: Fogma's goons are strolling through the town...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をしておるのだか、 まったく気持ちの悪い……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know what they're up to, but I don't have a good feeling about it...

Entry.JapaneseText: どけーッ、ガジュマめが!! 近寄るなッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Go away, you damn Gajuma! Don't get close to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと仲良くする ヒューマは、いつか報いを 受けるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma who befriend Gajuma will get their comeuppance someday.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガ、ガジュマめ…… ワシに何の用だ……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-You damn Gajuma... What do you want from me...?

Entry.JapaneseText: い、いつでも相手に……
Entry.EnglishText: T-Talk to me anytime...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと仲良くしても 何も良い事はないぞよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Nothing good can come from befriending Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、おじさん。 ハックっていう……
Entry.EnglishText: Excuse me, mister. We're looking for a guy called Hack...

Entry.JapaneseText: ハック？ ハックがどうした？
Entry.EnglishText: Hack? What about him?

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ ハックを知ってるの？ ハックはどこ？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? You know him? Where is he?

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？ どうしたの、おじさん？
Entry.EnglishText: Hm? What's the matter, mister?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……うるさい。 ヒューマには何も教えられん。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Be quiet. I have nothing to say to a Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナニそれー！
Entry.EnglishText: What's up with you?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……妙だな。ガジュマたちは 何をコソコソやってるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...That was weird. I wonder what's got the Gajuma around here acting so evasive?

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックに関係があるのは 間違いなさそうだな。 それに個人的な話ではないようだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It definitely seems to be because of Hack. And I doubt it's some private affair.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……フォグマに話を 聞くのがよさそうだな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...We should go ask Chief Fogma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
